And then they heat MEN SCREAMING, and suddenly, Henderson Daniels and one of the Diggers come running down the stai
RUN, YOU SONS-A-BITCHES! RUUUUN!

O'Connell and Jonathan join them as they hear the herd of CHITTERING scarabs coming their way. The Digger suddenly  trips and falls. O'Connell slows down, about to go back a help him. But it's too late. The Digger SCREAMS in horror the herd of scarabs run over him, eating straight through him, leaving behind the Digger's half eaten skeleton. Dan Henderson and Jonathan react in horror. O'Connell's alrea running, races right past them. The others turn and haul  ass.
Imhotep steps forward, -- the sand around him seems to  MAGNETIZE, swirling and dancing around his flaking skelet legs. Evelyn starts backing away, horrified, looks at Bur
Help me,... please,... help me.

Burns opens his mouth, but can only GURGLE and MOAN becau HIS TONGUE IS MISSING. Imhotep grabs him, throws him to t ground and sets his skeletal foot on Burns' chest, like a big game hunter standing on his kill. Imhotep then parts fetid lips, -- A FRESH TONGUE FLAPS BETWEEN HIS ROTTED TE
Kadeesh pharos Anck-su-namun!
Evelyn shivers in fear. Suddenly, O'Connell comes flying  around the corner and runs right up to her.
Would you quit playin, around! Let's  get outta here already!
O'Connell sees the look in her eyes and turns around, -- the sight of Imhotep, O'Connell jumps back in fright.
WHOA!

O'Connell and Evelyn start backing away down the wall. Imhotep glides sideways with them, like a tiger cornering his prey, the sand around him SWIRLS and DANCES. Burns st to crawl away, whimpering as he goes. Imhotep suddenly st and UNHINGES his skeletal jaw, his skinless mouth stretch to an inhuman size, and he lets out a horrific, primordia SHRIEK.
ANCK-SU-NAMUUUUUN!!!!
Evelyn SCREAMS. O'Connell shudders, then, embarrassed by fear, he opens his own mouth and ROARS right back at him
Ahhhhhhhh!!
Then BLASTS him with the elephant gun, --BLAM! Through th SMOKE AND FLAMMAGE we see Imhotep blown off his feet, his ribcage half torn away. O'Connell grabs Evelyn and runs.

SAND and WIND whip through the ruins as O'Connell and Eve stumble up out of the crevice and COME FACE-TO-FACE WITH ARMED MUMIA. The Mumia quickly raise their guns. O'Connel and Evelyn quickly raise their hands. Jonathan, Henderson Daniels and the Egyptologist are already on their knees,  hands over their heads. Ardeth Ray steps forward.
I told you to leave or die, you  refused, and now you may have killed  us all. For you have unleashed the  creature that we have feared for  more than four thousand years.
Relax, I got him.
No mortal weapons can kill this  creature. He is not of this world.
Are we talkin, about the same  creature? The walking corpse? Really  big mouth? Really bad breath?

Beni slowly backs up around Anubis, eyes wide, gun up. He turns around, -- IMHOTEP IS RIGHT THERE! Beni SCREAMS, ba away and OPENS FIRE. Six GUNSHOTS perforate Imhotep, but  have no effect except to SPLATTER molten flesh rot onto t back wall. Beni retreats into a corner, scared shitless. Imhotep moves forward, his one hand trying to stop the mo mummy guts from oozing out of the large shotgun hole in h side. Beni drops his gun and grabs at the CHAINS around h neck, RELIGIOUS SYMBOLS AND ICONS dangle from each chain. Beni holds the first one up: A CHRISTIAN CRUCIFIX. He qui makes the sign of-the cross and blesses himself in Englis
May the good Lord protect and watch  over me as a shepherd watches over  his flock. And may Satan in all his  forms be vanquished forever.

It has no effect on Imhotep, who continues forward. Beni  quickly grabs at the other symbols and icons, holding the out towards Imhotep, one after the other, trying to slow progress: an Islamic Sword and Crescent Moon necklace; a  Hindu Brahma medallion; a small Buddhist Bodhisattva stat All while blessing himself in Arabic, Hindi, Chinese and  Latin. Nothing works. Imhotep's skeletal hand reaches for Beni's throat. Tears run down Beni's cheeks he's so freak And that's when he holds up THE STAR OF DAVID and blesses himself in HEBREW. Imhotep stops in his tracks. His hand  lowers. His grotesque new eyeballs stare at Beni.
(subtitled) The language of the slaves.
Looks at him quizzically. Imhotep takes a step back.
(in Hebrew -- subtitled) I may have use for you. And the  rewards will be great.

Imhotep reaches into his tattered robe, and then holds ou his fetid hand, filled with squirming MAGGOTS. Beni cring about to throw up, but then the maggots part, -- revealin tiny pile of little JEWELS. Beni's eyes widen. Imhotep ra his other hand, it holds Anck-su-namun's BROKEN CANOPIC J
Where are the other sacred jars?
Several Mumia drag Burns up, he stares out with vacant  sockets. Daniels and Henderson are especially horrified.
You bastards!
What did you do to him!?
We saved him! Saved him before the  creature could finish his work. Now  leave, all of you, quickly, before  he finishes you all.
You're not going to kill us?
Evelyn ELBOWS Jonathan in the ribs.
We must now hunt him down, and try  and find a way to kill him, before  he consumes the earth. Allah be with  us.
Ardeth Ray and the Mumia start heading down into the crev O'Connell yells at them, trying to convince himself.
I told ya, I already got him!
Ardeth Ray stops and looks back, deadly serious.
Know this, the creature will be coming  for you. He must consummate the curse.  And until he does, he will never  eat, he will never sleep, and he  will never stop.
Ardeth Ray turns and jumps down into the crevice,

O'Connell and Jonathan boost Evelyn up onto a camel. Dani and Henderson throw Burns up onto another. The Egyptologi still clutching The Book Of The Dead, gets up on yet anot They all head off into the dark, windblown desert... And then in the extreme foreground, A SKELETAL HAND SUDDE

head_text.subj: PUNCHES UP OUT OF THE SAND, ACCOMPANIED BY THE MOST HORRI

text: ANCK-SU-NAMUUUUUN!!!!
A British flag flies over BRITISH SOLDIERS manning the fr gate. Our tired, disheveled Heroes saunter up on their du camels. The Soldiers check their papers, then let them en
A steamer trunk is slammed to the floor and thrown open. O'Connell chucks a load of DRESSES into the trunk.
I thought you didn't believe in this  stuff!?
O'Connell heads for the closet. Evelyn UNPACKS the dresse
Having an encounter with a four  thousand year old walking-talking  corpse tends to convert one.
Forget it, we're out the door down  the hall and gone.
No, we are not.
O'Connell throws a handful of her underthings into the tr
Oh yes we are.
O'Connell continues to PACK Evelyn's clothes as she conti to UNPACK them:
No we are not. We woke him up, and  we must try and stop him.
We?! What we?! You didn't read that  book. I told you not to play around  with that thing.
Alright then, Me, I,... I read the  book, I woke him up and I intend to  stop him.
O'Connell angrily stretches a bra between his hands.
How!? You heard the man, no mortal  weapons can kill this guy.
Evelyn grabs the bra and throws it into a drawer.
Then we'll have to find some immortal  ones.
There goes that belief again. Not  me, I am outta here!

O'Connell stuffs a pile of Evelyn's shoes into the trunk. Evelyn KICKS the lid shut, slamming it on his fingers. O'Connell YELPS and angrily storms around the room suckin his fingers as Evelyn follows him.

According to that Book, once this  creature has been reborn, his curse  will spread, and as he grows in  strength, so will his curse grow,  infecting the people until the whole  of the earth is destroyed.
Yeah? So? Is that my problem?
(incredulous) It's everybody's problem!

Look lady, I appreciate you saving  my life and all, but when I signed  on, I agreed to take you out there  and bring you back, and I did, now  were even, end of job, end of story,  contract terminated.
That's what I am to you? A contract?
You can either tag along with me, or  you can stay here and play around  with Mister Maggot.
I'm staying.
FINE.
O'Connell storms out and SLAMS the door. A BEAT. Then the door opens and O'Connell's hand reaches back in and throw handful of frilly panties to the floor. SLAM goes the doo
O'Connell angrily strides through the compound. He sees B coming up the path with a MAN dressed in hooded robes, hi face covered by an ornate death mask. Imhotep disguised.
Beni ya little stinkweed, where did  you slink off to?
You left me! You left me in the desert  to rot.
Oh yeah,... sorry bout that. (gestures to Imhotep) So who's this guy?
This is Prince Imhotep, High Priest  of Osiris.
Oh, hey, how ya doin'?
O'Connell sticks out his hand, -- Imhotep instantly recoi O'Connell gives him the once-over. Beni quickly covers.
The Prince does not like to be touched  by other humans. A Silly eastern  superstition, I'm afraid.
Yeah, well, we all got our little  problems today don't we?
He has come to help Mister Burns.  Somehow I feel responsible.
Don't gimme that, you never had any  scruples.
Do you know where I can steal some?
O'Connell fake-punches him. Beni flinches. O'Connell give Imhotep a look as he strides off.
See ya around, Padre.
Imhotep's grotesque new eyes glare out from behind the ma

The proverbial den-of-iniquity. Hard men, hard women and  hard liquor. Lots of deals going down. An OLDER GUY with walrus mustache is drunk and talking to some tough custom He wears British WWI fighter pilot gear. Meet WINSTON HAV
I'm the last of the Royal Force still  stationed here, you know? All the  other laddies died in the air and  were buried in the sand.
The tough customers shove him away. Winston staggers over O'Connell and Jonathan at the bar, not missing a beat.
Ever since the end of the Great War,  there hasn't been a single challenge  worthy of a man like me.
I've heard it before, Winston.
O'Connell shoves him away. Winston staggers back to Jonat
I just wish I would've chucked it  with the other laddies, gone down in  a flame of glory, instead of sitting  around here, rotting from boredom  and booze!
Jonathan shoves him towards another group of unlucky sods Henderson and Daniels sidle up to the bar next to them. Burns, now tongue-less, talks with a severe impediment.
The drawer there, spectacles. (tries to laugh) As you see, I won't be needing them.
Imhotep opens the drawer and pulls out some bifocals. He  puts the bifocals on over his death mask, -- and grins  broadly, his rotted teeth showing through the mouth hole.
Mister Burns, Prince Imhotep thanks  you for your spectacles, -- and for  your eyes,... and for your tongue.
The expression on Burns' face starts to change, very puzz
But I am afraid more is needed, the  Prince says he must finish the job,  consummate the curse which you and  your friends have brought down upon  yourselves.

A look of pure fear registers on Burns, face. Beni quickl backs away and runs out of the room. Imhotep picks up the sacred canopic jar, then removes the death mask, revealin his hideous, shattered CORPSE-SKULL.
Three shot glasses clink together. O'Connell, Jonathan an Henderson slug 'em down, -- all three of them instantly S OUT the liquid. Half the bar SPITS OUT their drinks as we
Sweet Jesus! That tasted just like,...  like...
Blood.
They all look at each other, even more nervous.
"And the rivers and waters of Egypt  went red and were as blood."
A look passes over O'Connell's face, a realization.
He's here.
He suddenly jumps away from the bar and runs for the door
Who's here!?
The guy! The Priest! THE MUMMY!
LIGHTNING FLASHES as O'Connell races across the compound, knocking several Soldiers out of his way, panic stricken.
Evelyn!! EVELYYYYNN!!!

Evelyn calmly steps into a courtyard carrying a handful o books. A BLAST OF THUNDER AND LIGHTNING scares her. She d half the books. Then a HAND GRABS HER! She jumps again an drops the rest of the books. It's O'Connell, breathing ha
We got problems.

And that's when a barrage of HAIL AND FIRE slams into the courtyard. O'Connell and Evelyn jump back. A water founta bursts into STEAM. A wooden trellis catches FIRE. O'Conne and Evelyn run under the eaves as SOLDIERS, SERVANTS and  CAMELS run in every direction, trying to avoid the maelst
He's here! I saw him! That thing is  here!
The creature!? Are you sure!?
O'Connell gives her an incredulous look and gestures at t HAIL and FIRE.
Pretty sure!

The HAIL and FIRE come to a stop. Everything goes dead qu O'Connell and Evelyn freeze. And then a BLOOD CURDLING SC is heard coming from the living quarters directly above t O'Connell and Evelyn race up the stairs.

O'Connell and Evelyn race into the room, past the Servant who is running out SCREAMING. They skid to a stop as they spot Burns, or what's left of him, lying dead on the floo HIS BODY IS SHRIVELED TO HALF IT'S SIZE. Drained of all organs and liquids. O'Connell and Evelyn a shocked. Then they hear a LOUD MOAN and notice Imhotep  standing on the far side of the room. O'Connell draws his gun. Imhotep is REGENERATING: A thick skin FORMS over powerful new musculature. His tendons RIPPLE. His bones BULGE and  REFORM. His mouth opens to an inhuman size as he MOANS an CRIES OUT, in severe pain. And then it's over. And he loo like an incredibly muscular, corpse-like vision from hell The 'Terminator' Mummy. O'Connell and Evelyn are stunned.
We are in serious trouble.
Imhotep starts to move towards them, staring at Evelyn.
Back off, creep.

Imhotep keeps coming. O'Connell OPENS FIRE. BLASTING Imho Bullets RIP through his body. Imhotep doesn't seem to min Jonathan, Henderson and Daniels run into the room. They'r all stunned at the sight of Imhotep. O'Connell steps forward, throws a RIGHT HOOK, punches Imh in the face, -- HIS FIST GOES THROUGH IMHOTEP'S SKULL AND GETS STUCK DEEP INSIDE HIS HEAD. O'Connell stares at it,  shocked, then quickly YANKS his fist back out. The area o Imhotep's face that came into contact with O'Connell's fi quickly DEGENERATES and DECAYS, right down to the bone, a if O'Connell's hand instantly infected it. Imhotep angrily turns, grabs O'Connell, and with no effor THROWS him across the room and into Jonathan and the othe knocking them down. Imhotep looks at his hand, the one th just grabbed O'Connell, -- IT STARTS TO SHRIVEL and DECAY He quickly turns to Evelyn. Evelyn backs away into a wall terrorized. Imhotep steps up to her.
You saved me from the undead. For  this, I shall make you immortal.

He leans in, about to kiss her with his decayed face. And that's when a WHITE CAT jumps onto the piano, HISSING Imhotep SHRIEKS. The balcony doors BLOW OPEN. Imhotep spi into a BLAST OF WIND AND SAND and SWIRLS out the doors. G O'Connell, Evelyn, Jonathan and Daniels stand transfixed. Henderson kneels next to Burns, shriveled body, horrified
The curse. The curse.
O'Connell, Jonathan, Henderson and Daniels follow Evelyn  across the Ramesseum.
There's only one person I know who  can possibly give us some answers.
They round a corner and come upon the Curator, -- who is  talking with Ardeth Ray. Everybody stops.
YOU!
O'Connell and the American's quickly draw their guns. Ard Ray just scowls. The Curator nods his head.
Miss Carnavon. Gentlemen.
What is he doing here?
Do you truly wish to know? Or would  you prefer to just shoot us?
Everybody tenses, guns up. Then O'Connell uncocks his .38
I just saw my fist vanish into some  guy's head.
He slides his gun back into his shoulder-holster.
I'm willin, to go on a little faith,  here.
You will not believe it.
Try me.
Everyone is assembled around the tomb display of Seti The First. We recognize his chariot and sword. The Curator sits on S throne.

We are part of an ancient secret  society, the cult-of-the-Mumia, and  we have a sacred mission, passed  down through thirty-nine generations.  For over four thousand years we have  guarded The City Of The Dead. we are  sworn at manhood to do any and all  in our power to stop the High Priest  Imhotep from being reborn into this  world.
And because of you, we have failed.
(appalled) And you think this justifies killing  innocent people!?
To have stopped this creature? Yes!
Okay, let's cut to the chase. He's  afraid of cats, what's that about?
According to the ancients, cat's are  the guardians at the gates of the  underworld. Imhotep will fear them  until he is fully regenerated, and  then he will fear nothing.
Daniels is totally wigged-out, he looks at O'Connell.
Right! And ya know how he gets fully  regenerated?! By killing everybody  who opened that chest and sucking us  dry! That's how!
Yes, the creature must first try and  regenerate, and then he will attempt  to resurrect the one he has loved  for more than four thousand years.
Anck-su-namun.
The Curator and Ardeth Ray look at Evelyn, thunderstruck.
In the necropolis, when I saw him, - alive,... walking, he called me Anck- su-namun. And then in Mister Burns'  quarters he tried to kiss me.
It is because it was you who read  from the Book. He has chosen you to  be the human sacrifice needed to  regenerate the body of Anck-su-namun.
Jonathan scratches his ear with the barrel of his pistol.
This is not good. Not good at all.
Ardeth Ray has been staring out a wall of windows.
Tonight is the full moon. The moon  of Osiris. It will begin tonight.
Everyone follows Ardeth Ray's eyes, through the windows w can see the SUN, -- which is now going into a FULL ECLIPS
"...and he stretched forth his hands  towards the heavens, and there was  darkness throughout the land of  Egypt."
O'Connell looks out a window at the British Soldiers mann the walls. Above and beyond them, -- is the BLACK SUN.
Evelyn and Jonathan are pacing the foyer
We must stop him from regenerating.
She turns to Daniels and Henderson.
Who opened that chest?
Well, there was me and Daniels here  and then poor Burns of course, oh  yeah, and that Egyptologist fella.
O'Connell turns from the window.
What about my buddy, Beni?
Naw, he scrammed outta there,
We must find the Egyptologist and  bring him back here to the safety of  the fort, before the creature can  get to him.
O'Connell looks at Evelyn, Daniels and Henderson.
Okay,... Evelyn, you wait here, you  two come with me.
All three of them pounce on him at once --
The hell with that! I'm not goin'  nowhere! We're safe here.
Yeah, I'm not leavin, this fort for  nothin'.
Who put you in charge? You can't  just leave me behind like some old  suitcase. I'm the one responsible  for this mess and I intend to be the  one to clean it up.

O'Connell just shakes his head and SIGHS. Totally put-upo Then he takes Evelyn, shoves her into the bedroom, slams door and locks it with a skeleton key. From inside her ro we can hear Evelyn POUNDING on the door and YELLING. O'Connell throws the skeleton key to Daniels.
Keep an eye on her. If you leave her  door, I'll rip your spleen out. C'mon,  Jonathan.
Jonathan swallows hard and points to himself.
Me?

The Egyptologist stumbles through the dark alleys, lookin haunted. He clutches the Book of The Dead in one hand and his SACRED CANOPIC JAR in the other. Imhotep is stalking  him. A STREET VENDOR turns and sees Imhotep's horribly de face. He reacts and scurries away. Imhotep lifts his robe, cove his face, and moves in on the Egyptologist, who is headin into the bazaar. WE PAN UP TO --

Beni is RANSACKING the joint, pulling out drawers and fil and throwing them on the floor. He finds a silver pocket  watch, shakes it, then throws it into his pocket, then he starts tipping over bookcases and clearing shelves.
Well, well, well.
Beni spins around. O'Connell and Jonathan stand in the do
Lemme guess, spring cleaning?

Beni turns and runs for an open window. O'Connell grabs a chair, FLINGS IT into his path. Beni TRIPS and CRASHES in a wall. O'Connell strides over, grabs him and lifts him u the wall. Beni's feet dangle off the floor.
Where's your new friend?
What friend? You're my only friend.
O'Connell quickly slides his knife up under Beni's chin.
Then you got no excuse for living.  What the hell you doin, being buddies  with this creep, Beni? What's in it  for you?
It is better to be the right hand of  the Devil,... than in his path. As  long as I serve him, I am immune.
Immune from what?
You shall see.
What are you looking for? Lie, and  I'll slit your throat.
O'Connell shoves the knife deeper into Beni's skin.
The book! The black book they found  at Hamunaptra! Imhotep wants it back.  Said to me it would be worth it's  weight in diamonds.
What does he want the book for?
(shrugs) Something about bringing his dead  girly-friend back to life. He needs  the book... (looks at Jonathan) And your sister.
O'Connell looks at Jonathan. Beni seizes the moment and K O'Connell in the balls. O'Connell doubles over and collap Beni leaps out the window. Jonathan cringes.
That looked rather painful.
(wincing) Ya know, ever since I met you, my  luck has been for crap.
Yes, I know, I do that to people.
And that's when they hear a BLOOD CURDLING SCREAM coming  from down in the bazaar. O'Connell and Jonathan scramble the window and look out --

Down in the bazaar, people are SCREAMING and quickly back away from the SHRIVELED CORPSE OF THE EGYPTOLOGIST. A partially decayed HAND reaches down and takes the sacre canopic jar out of the Egyptologist's shriveled hand. It' Imhotep, having regenerated even further. He looks up and catches eyes with O'Connell. Imhotep grins, then UNHINGES his jaw, his mouth stretches to an inhuman size, and then huge SWARM OF FLIES comes out of his mouth and races stra up at O'Connell and Jonathan. They both SLAM the shutters The flies SLAM into the closed window and immediately spr throughout the bazaar. Sending people SCREAMING and runni
O'Connell and Jonathan look at each other, panicked.
Damn-it! That's two down and only  two to go.
And then he'll be coming after Evy.
They turn and race out of the office.
Daniels stares out a window, watching the British Guards the front gate. More Soldiers march the encircling parape
Ten o'clock! All is well!
The lights and MUSIC from the Casbah come up from below
Daniels turns from the window. Henderson sits in a chair  next to Evelyn's door, chain smoking. Both look wired wit fear.
The hell with this. I'm goin,  downstairs to get me a drink. You  want somethin'?
Yeah, get me a glass of bourbon, a  shot of bourbon and a bourbon chaser.

Daniels nods and heads out. Henderson just sits there, al smoking. He reaches into his jacket pocket, pulls out his SACRED CANOPIC JAR and fondles it. A BREEZE suddenly come in through the open window. The curtains flutter. Henders gets up and goes over to shut it. He looks out the window The CAMERA races over the compound, into the window and H Henderson square in the FACE just as he's about to scream Henderson is lifted into the air by a mass of SWIRLING SA His body TWISTS and TURNS and slowly SHRIVELS as the life SUCKED out of him. Then he COLLAPSES to the floor. On the wall above him, th SHADOW of the SWIRLING SAND condenses, forming a SHADOW o human body. The SHADOW CONVULSES as the body REGENERATES. And then it's over. Imhotep steps into view. He's regenerated even further an looks almost normal now, his face no longer decayed. He s over Henderson's shriveled body and up to Evelyn's door,  rattles the knob. It's locked. Imhotep grins.

Evelyn is asleep in her bed as SAND begins streaming in  through the keyhole, pouring onto the floor, forming a la mound. Evelyn starts to toss and turn. WE PAN BACK OVER T THE DOOR: The mound of sand is gone and in it's place is  Imhotep.

O'Connell and Jonathan race into the foyer and skid to a  stop as they see Henderson's shriveled body on the floor. O'Connell runs up to Evelyn's door and rattles the knob,  still locked. He bends down and looks in through the KEYH

Imhotep leans down towards Evelyn, about to kiss her as s sleeps. The door starts to CRASH and BANG from O'Connell. Imhotep ignores it. And KISSES Evelyn. His lips and mouth instantly start to DEGENERATE and DECAY. Right down to th bone. The door BURSTS OPEN. Evelyn wakes up. Sees Imhotep rotted mouth kissing her. She SCREAMS and shoves him away Imhotep's putrid mouth grimaces in sadness.
Get your hands off my girl, pal.
Imhotep's sadness turns to anger as he spins around and f O'Connell. Imhotep licks his fetid lips. O'Connell smirks
Nice lips.
Imhotep starts to move for O'Connell.
I figured you might be here, so I  brought a friend.

He throws the white cat at Imhotep. Imhotep instinctively catches it. He SHRIEKS, drops the cat and stumbles back towards the  window, -- which suddenly BLOWS OPEN. Imhotep spins like dervish and BURSTS INTO A WHIRLWIND OF SAND. Everybody covers their eyes. The Imhotep/sand-devil EXPLO out the window and vanishes over the compound. Jonathan aims his gun at the window, his hand shaking bad O'Connell hugs Evelyn as she wipes her mouth in disgust. Daniels walks in, looks at Henderson's shriveled body on floor... and drops the martini glasses.
Jonathan races his big convertible through the streets,  HONKING constantly. Evelyn sits between him and O'Connell looking scared and nervous, then she gives O'Connell a lo
You called me your girl?
What?... Oh yeah, that was just um,  you know, figure a speech.
I think you were jealous
Jealous? You kiddin' me? Did you see  that guy's face?
Daniels leans forward from the back seat, filled with fea
Shut-up! JUST SHUT-UP! We gotta do  somethin'! we gotta do somethin,  NOW! Before it's too late!
They race into the driveway of the museum of Antiquities.

A FULL MOON now shines down on the bazaar, still bustling with activity. Suddenly, a BREEZE kicks-in. GREEN MIST be to SWIRL down the street and through the stalls. The peop begin to CHOKE and COUGH and RETCH, as if being hit by a  severe sickness -- it's already too late. Imhotep strolls through the sickened mob, his face half r off, his deformed mouth grinning happily. Beni is at his  side, looking very nervous. And then, one-by-one, the people silently begin to follow Imhotep, their skin now covered in disgustingly hideous B AND SORES.
O'Connell., Jonathan, Daniels, the Curator and Ardeth Ray follow Evelyn as she strides through the museum.
Last month I came across an  inscription that mentioned The Book  Of The Dead.
That book we found at Hamunaptra?
Yes. I dismissed it, because it talked  about bringing people back from the  dead. A notion I was unwilling to  believe.
Believe it, sister. That's what  brought our buddy back to life.
And now he's going to use it to bring  his girlfriend back
And if he succeeds, the two of them  together will bring about the  apocalypse.
The Curator joins Evelyn at her side as she heads up the  stairs, everyone else in hot pursuit.
The plagues we have seen so far, are  merely Imhotep flexing his muscles.  Only at the moment of Anck-su-namun's  resurrection will he be truly  invincible.
They reach the display cases. Evelyn quickly opens them.
I'm thinking that if the black Book  Of The Dead can bring people back to  life --
-- then perhaps, the golden Book Of  The Living can return them to the  underworld.
Exactly --
So your sayin', if we find the book  made outta gold --
-- And read the sacred incantations  contained inside it.
You think it'll send this guy back  to hell?
Correct, And that's when --

LOUD CHANTING is heard coming from outside. They all rush over to the upper windows and look down -- OUTSIDE: A lar CRAZED MOB covered in hideous boils and sores comes CHANT up the driveway: 'Anck-su-namun! Anck-su-namun!'
It has begun. The beginning of the  end.
Not quite yet it hasn't. C'mon.
Evelyn dashes back to the display cases. Everyone follows
The crazed mob CRASHES into the huge front doors, which a locked. They pound furiously, throwing themselves at it w CHANTING CONSTANTLY. Imhotep solemnly comes up the drivew
The BANGING on the doors can be heard as Evelyn and the  Curator quickly sort through broken pieces of stone table The others watch. Evelyn pulls out a large piece.
Got it!
Got what?
The BANGING gets LOUDER. Multiple windows SHATTER. Evelyn talks while quickly translating the tablet:
Since the black Book of The Dead was  found inside the statue of Anubis,  then according to this, the golden  Book of The Living should be inside...
Evelyn finds the translation in the tablet and smiles.
What?
What?
WHAT!?
The golden Book Of The Living, is  inside the statue of Horus.
Which would be located not far to  the east of the Anubis statue.
Don't tell me we gotta go back out  there?
If we want to kill the creature,  yes.

TWO HIDEOUS BOIL & SORE-COVERED MEN charge out of a doorw SCREAMING. O'Connell and Ardeth Ray grab them and chuck t over the railing. The men fly through the air and CRASH i the lower display cases. The front doors suddenly BURST O The crazed mob pours into the museum. our heroes haul ass across the balcony and down the staircase.

Jonathan sneaks out of some bushes and quickly heads for convertible. Suddenly, a splinter group of the diseased m comes around the side of the museum. Jonathan instantly b his eyes out, starts drooling, and begins CHANTING --
Anck-su-namun! Anck-su-namun!

The crazed group runs past him and heads into the front d of the museum. Jonathan leaps into the convertible, fires up and 180's it back over to the bushes. O'Connell, Evelyn, Daniels, Ardeth Ray and the Curator ju inside the car. Beni steps out of the museum and sees the
Imhotep! IMHOTEP!
Imhotep looks out of the museum from the shattered upper  windows just as the convertible PEELS OUT. O'Connell poin a finger at Beni as they race past him.
You're gonna get yours, pal!

Imhotep UNHINGES his jaw, his mouth stretches to an inhum size, he lets out one of his horrific, primordial SHRIEKS His disease-ridden disciples immediately begin pouring ou of the front doors of the museum and chasing after the ca

The convertible hauls ass down the narrow bazaar street. Crazies start jumping out of stalls and LEAPING onto the  car. O'Connell and the others fight them off, throwing th overboard. More people JUMP on. Jonathan SWERVES the car, CRASHES through some stalls, knocking them off, but not b they manage to open the back door and YANK Daniels out. H TUMBLES across the pavement. Gets up SHOOTING. Backs into corner, FIRING his pistol into the hideous rabble, killin several, keeping them at bay. His gun goes empty, CLICK!  CLICK! CLICK! But the mob stays back, looking at him like rabid vultures. Daniels eyes them, filled with fear. The mob parts like the red sea as Imhotep walks through t and up to Daniels. Daniels whimpers in fear, tears pour d his cheeks. Then he gets an idea, reaches into his pocket and pulls out his jewel encrusted SACRED CANOPIC JAR. He  holds it out for Imhotep. Imhotep takes it and grins. Thr his tears, Daniels grins back, hopeful that he'll be spar WE CUT WIDE: Somewhere in the middle of the crazed, disea mob, we hear Daniels give out A BLOOD CURDLING SCREAM...

The convertible slowly motors down the narrow alleys. WE  DOLLY across the hood of the car from Jonathan to Evelyn O'Connell. Ardeth Ray and the Curator are still in the ba All of them staring out the front windshield. Freaked-out Then suddenly one of the hideous ghouls CRASHES through t windshield! Everybody SCREAMS. Jonathan hits the gas, los control, the car SLAMS into a wall. O'Connell grabs Evely
C'mon! C'mon! Let's go! Let's go!

They all leap out of the car. But the angry, festering mo quickly surrounds them. O'Connell quickly reaches into hi gunny-sack, pulls out a stick of dynamite, then reaches i his pocket and pulls out a match. He looks around for a w to light it, then reaches over and strikes it across Arde Ray's stubbly face. Ardeth Ray YELPS. O'Connell holds the lit match near the fuse. The crazed, CHANTING mob gives O'Connell a wide berth, st at him and the others with insane, bloodshot eyes. And then Imhotep steps through, -- having fully regenerat he now looks as young and handsome and muscular as he did the day he was buried alive. Evelyn stares at him.
He's gorgeous.

O'Connell gives her a look, the match burns his fingers. YELPS and throws it down, grabs another match and strikes across Ardeth Ray's face again. Ardeth Ray YELPS and give O'Connell a look to kill. The Curator shakes his head.
He has consummated the curse, now  all he need do is raise Anck-su-namun  from the dead, then it will be the  end of us, and the beginning for  them.

Imhotep moves forward, heading right for them. O'Connell  LIGHTS THE FUSE. Imhotep steps up to O'Connell and stops, watching the fuse burn down. it's a game of chicken. The  tension mounts. The LIT FUSE is about to vanish inside th stick of dynamite, blowing it up, -- when Evelyn leans fo and blows it out. O'Connell exhales, but keeps his eyes o Imhotep, who extends his hand to Evelyn.
Koontash dai na.
Beni steps through the swarming mass, translating.
Take his hand and he will spare the  others.

Evelyn hesitates, looks around at the huge, bloodthirsty  crowd surrounding them, holding axes, picks and scimitars waiting to pounce, then she looks at Imhotep, confident,  powerful, invincible. Then she looks at O'Connell.
Any bright ideas?
O'Connell talks through angry, grit teeth.
Sorry, fresh out.
Evelyn looks back at Imhotep, then starts to reach out to take his hand. Both O'Connell and Jonathan move to stop h but Ardeth Ray grabs them both and holds them tight.
Don't do it, Evelyn.
I have no choice.
Evelyn's trembling hand touches Imhotep's: His hand close around hers. Nothing happens. Imhotep smiles.
Keetah mi pharos, aja nilo, isirlan.
Come with me my princess. It is time  to make you mine, forever.
Evelyn gives Beni a nasty look, correcting him --
All eternity, idiot.
Then she looks at O'Connell and puts on her best face.
You better think of something, because  if he turns me into a mummy, you're  the first one I'm coming after.
O'Connell almost smiles.
Got guts, lady.
Yes, I know, and I'd like to keep  them.
Imhotep suddenly notices something. He reaches forward an RIPS THE KEY/BOX OUT OF JONATHAN'S UPPER JACKET POCKET.
Hey that's mine -- !
Ardeth Ray holds Jonathan back. Imhotep pulls Evelyn away O'Connell can't take it anymore, he tries to break free o Ardeth Ray's grip.
Evelyn!
The huge, powerful man holds him tight.
Be calm. There is still time. We can  stop him yet.
The crowd parts for Imhotep and Evelyn. And then Imhotep  stops and looks back at O'Connell.
Pared oos.
Evelyn SCREAMS.
NOOO!!
Beni smiles.
Kill them.
Imhotep pulls her away. O'Connell breaks free of Ardeth R grip and stumbles forward.
EVELYN!

But the rabid vultures are already moving in for the kill O'Connell quickly bends down, pulls open a CISTERN/MANHOL COVER and shoves Jonathan down inside it, then jumps in a him. The Curator pushes Ardeth Ray towards the cistern ho
Go! Find a way! Kill the creature!
The Curator turns and throws himself at the mob as Ardeth Ray crawls down into the hole. The mob tears the Curator  apart.

O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray slosh their way down t watery catacomb, crazies pouring in behind them. Up ahead LIGHT suddenly shines in from another cistern hole, and t more of the infected crowd drop down, SCREECHING like rat O'Connell jags right, pushing Jonathan and Ardeth Ray ahe of him, he strikes a match off the wall, lights the nubby fuse on a stick of dynamite, throws it, and runs like hel FIRE BLAST incinerates a bunch of crazies.
The EXPLOSION blows a cistern cover fifty feet into the a followed by a mass of FLAMMAGE...
A sewer grate is kicked out of a wall. O'Connell, Jonatha and Ardeth Ray climb out of the hole and into AN ALLEY.
We gotta get her back.
I'm with you, old man. No one touches  my sister like that and gets away  with it.
O'Connell looks at Ardeth Ray.
You know where he's taking her?
Yes. To Hamunaptra. To perform the  ritual.
Jonathan looks worried.
And what ritual would that be?
The ritual to bring the body of Anck- su-namun back to life.
And how does one do that?
By reading the Book Of The Dead.
Oh yes, of course.
And then killing your sister.
Excuse me?
Ardeth Ray looks at O'Connell.
Imhotep is now able to cross the  desert with great haste.
Jonathan taps him in the shoulder.
Begging your pardon, but I wasn't  quite clear on that last part.
Ardeth Ray ignores him.
If he arrives before us, it will be  too late.
Did you say 'kill' my sister?
O'Connell smiles.
I know how to beat him to it.

And on that WE SMASH CUT TO -- THE ERFOUD DUNES - DAWN  Jonathan's bashed-in convertible steams it's way up to a of semi-abandoned Quonset huts. A single WWI BIPLANE with R.A.F. INSIGNIAS sits in the sand beside them. A SIGN REA
O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray stand before Winston  Havlock, the massive dunes of Erfoud as our background.
So what's your little problem got to  do with His Majesty's Royal Air Corp?
Not a god-damned thing.
Winston looks intrigued.
Is it dangerous?
You probably won't live through it.
This really interests him.
By Jove, do you really think so?
Everybody else we've bumped into has  died, why not you?
Winston nods his head, he's hooked.
So what's the challenge then?
To save the damsel in distress, kill  the bad guy and steal his treasure.
A slow grin spreads across Winston's face, then he gives  them a snappy salute.
Winston Havlock at your service,  sir!

Way off across the desert, a large SAND-DEVIL races over dunes. The SANDY WHIRLWIND comes to a stop and starts to  dissipate. Evelyn and Beni are suddenly ejected out of it they land in a dune. The SWIRLING SAND CONDENSES AND FORM INTO IMHOTEP. He looks up into the sky, listening careful Evelyn shakes the sand out of her hair and looks at Beni.
What just happened?
All I remember is him turning into a  blast of sand,... and then I remember  nothing.
Then they hear a plane in the sky and look up.

The WIND whips at Winston in the cockpit. O'Connell sits the gunner's compartment. Jonathan is strapped spread-eag across the left wing, Ardeth Ray is tied tight to the rig Both men are scared out of their wits and SCREAMING in fe
Imhotep's jaw UNHINGES, his mouth opens to an inhuman siz he lets fly with another one of his horrible SHRIEKS. -- a massive WALL OF SAND rises up out of the desert
O'Connell watches the desert below him come alive and ris up towards the plane. Winston looks over the side and see what's coming. He laughs, throws the throttle, and puts t plane into a dive.
Hang on, men!

WE GO WIDE AS: The sandstorm chases the diving, twisting  biplane. Getting closer and closer, about to engulf it. O'Connell looks back into the blinding sand and sees a GI FACE forming inside the sandstorm. It's Imhotep. Grinning O'Connell grabs the Lewis machine-gun, cocks the bracket FIRES, blasting away at Imhotep's giant face inside the  sandstorm. Imhotep's face begins to laugh, then his jaw  unhinges, his mouth opens wide, and he ENGULFS the plane. Winston blindly fights for control, elated.
We're going down!
The biplane SPINS inside the BLOWING SAND. Engines ROARIN Wind HOWLING. Jonathan and Ardeth Ray SCREAMING. Winston  Havlock LAUGHING.
Here I come, laddies!
O'Connell braces himself for impact,
Evelyn leaps to her feet and runs over to Imhotep.
Stop it! You'll kill them!

Imhotep grabs her, pulls her close, her beautiful eyes st into his shockingly intense ones. Then he kisses her, har Evelyn's eyes widen, stunned and mesmerized, then she pus herself away and falls back into the sand. Imhotep laughs

The biplane SMASHES over a dune, ROLLS OVER and CRASHES u down into another dune. The SAND SWIRLS as O'Connell fall out of the gunner's compartment. The left wing is jammed  into the dune, Jonathan hangs upside down.
Excuse me... A little help would be  useful... IF IT'S NOT TOO MUCH  TROUBLE!!

O'Connell goes to help Jonathan. Ardeth Ray stumbles over the gunner's compartment and tears the Lewis gun off it's mount. He throws the machine-gun over one shoulder, a  cartridge belt over the other and staggers away. O'Connel and Jonathan look into the cockpit. Winston Havlock is de A smile on his face. The plane suddenly starts to move, t sand sinks under their feet, they quickly high-tail-it aw O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray make it to some rocks look back. The biplane, with Winston Havlock inside, slid away over a dune. O'Connell gives it a salute. The plane  vanishes over the dune and into the SWIRLING SAND...
O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray come down a ravine in volcano and look out over the ruins of Hamunaptra.
Okay, now what the hell does this  Horus guy look like?
He's a big fellow with pointy ears  and a face like a falcon.
Got it.
Carrying TORCHES, O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray make their way down a long, winding, narrow staircase. Heading into the bowels of the necropolis. A passageway to hell.

Evelyn follows Imhotep into the underground cemetery. She stops at the sight of all the big hairy rats scurrying th the mausoleums and over the gravestones. Beni shoves his  rifle into her back and pushes her forward.
Keep moving.
Evelyn gives him a look.
You know, nasty little fellows such  as yourself, always get their  comeuppance.
Beni suddenly looks worried.
Yeah?
Oh yes, always.
Beni looks even more worried, he nervously starts chewing his lip. All three of them walk over the bridge crossing disgusting DETRITUS MOAT. Evelyn looks down at it, horrif
O'Connell and Ardeth Ray are busy digging out a collapsed doorway. Jonathan notices an AMETHYST SCARAB on the far w
I say, look at that.
He walks over and tries to jiggle it free. It comes loose his hand. He looks at the scarab in his palm. It starts t glow. And then something inside it starts to WIGGLE.
Say, gents! You should come have a  look at this.

The wiggling continues; a long, agonizing BEAT, and then scarab breaks out of it's cocoon and instantly BURROWS in Jonathan's palm. Jonathan starts to freak out and SCREAM. O'Connell runs up and rips the arm off Jonathan's shirt. scarab is now BURROWING UP JONATHAN'S ARM. O'Connell whip out his butterfly-knife, snaps it open and grabs Jonathan arm. Jonathan's eyes widen in terror as the knife passes front of his face. Jonathan SCREAMS LOUDER, obviously bei cut open. O'Connell's hand flicks something away. The scarab hits the floor and immediately starts scurryin back towards Jonathan, wanting to finish the job. O'Connell pulls out his gun and blows it away, -- BLAM!

The GUNSHOT echoes into the cemetery as Imhotep, Evelyn a Beni step-up to the strange ALTAR, where four thousand ye ago Imhotep tried to bring Anck-su-namun back to life. Imhotep scowls at the sound and angrily reaches into a CA JAR. He pulls out the crusted remains of Anck-su-namun's  heart, crushes it to dust in his hand and starts reading  from The Book Of The Dead. Then he BLOWS the dust against mausoleum wall, -- THE WALL STARTS TO COME ALIVE. Evelyn and Beni stare at the wall, both of them wide-eyed TWO FORMS emerge from the mausoleum's wall. Horrific-look mummified CORPSES. Two of Imhotep's long dead Priests. They bow to Imhotep, then turn and move off down a passag
O'Connell helps Ardeth Ray mend Jonathan's wound.
From now on, don't touch anything.  Not a damn thing. Keep your hands  off the furniture, got it?
Jonathan swallows hard and nods vigorously.
Imhotep prepares the altar while speaking in HEBREW. Beni holds his gun on her, translating:
Prince Imhotep wants your heart.
Evelyn blushes, feeling complimented by the handsome prin
Tell him, I'm truly flattered... but  that it's already taken.
Imhotep continues SPEAKING while laying the four jewel  encrusted canopic jars next to the shattered one.
He wants your heart and your brain,  your liver, your kidneys...
Evelyn's eyes widen.
...and how do you say? Those slimy  things, in your stomach?
Intestines.
Yeah! Them.
Evelyn can't believe it, she furiously turns to Imhotep.
You only want me for my organs?!

Imhotep looks at her and grins, then BACKHANDS her -- WAP Evelyn goes down for the count. Imhotep stares at her, co malevolent, then he turns and walks off into the mausoleu Beni nervously glances around, then quickly scurries away

O'Connell squeezes through a small crevice in a wall and  drops to the floor of a dark chamber. He picks up his  gunnysack and scans the darkness. Something GLITTERS. Jon and Ardeth Ray crawl in behind him. O'Connell notices a SHAFT OF LIGHT, high above him, shoot through a small hole in the ceiling and stopping against wall next to one of those mirror disks. O'Connell aims hi gun. FIRES. The bullet STRIKES the disk's pedestal, spinn the mirror into the shaft of light, -- And WHAM! THE SHAF

head_text.subj: OF LIGHT HITS THE DISK AND QUICKLY BOUNCES AROUND THE ROO
FROM ONE DISK TO ANOTHER UNTIL THE WHOLE CHAMBER IS LIT U

text: It's an enormous TREASURE CHAMBER. Filled to overflowing. Everything sparkles and shines. The wealth of Egypt. O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray are speechless. That's when the two mummified Priest-mummies walk in.
Who the hell are these guys?
Priests. Imhotep's priests.
O'Connell pulls the elephant gun out of his gunny-sack.
I never killed a priest before.
They are evil, cursed, they matter  not.
Well, okay then.

O'Connell FIRES the elephant gun. SMOKE and FLAME shoot o BLASTS one of the mummies. Blows it's upper torso clean o O'Connell pumps the gun, the huge spent cartridge flips  through the air. He FIRES again. BLASTS the other mummy,  blows this one's torso clean off as well. The smoke clear The two sets of LEGS keep walking forward, unaffected by loss of their upper torsos. O'Connell can't believe it.
Oh come on, gimme a break here.
And then the disemboweled upper torsos start to move, tur over and crawling towards our heroes, who start to back a

Imhotep turns from the altar as he hears more GUNSHOTS ec out of the passageways. He angrily reaches into another o Anck-su-namun's canopic jars, pulls out her crusty liver crushes it to dust, then quickly starts reading a passage from the Book and BLOWS the dust down a passageway.
(ancient Egyptian --  subtitled) Kill them! Kill them all! And bring  me the Book Of The Living!

A dusty BREEZE blows into the chamber as O'Connell, Jonat and Ardeth Ray back away from the mummy pieces. The floor where they were just standing suddenly STARTS TO MOVE. Tw more mummies slowly dig their way up out of the floor. Mo mummies start coming out of the walls and crawling out of the piles of gold. All the mummies head for our heroes. O'Connell lifts the elephant gun. Ardeth Ray stops him.
My turn.

Ardeth Ray OPENS UP with the Lewis gun. BLASTING the shit out of the mummies. They keep on coming. Even more now. O'Connell OPENS FIRE with the elephant gun, pumping and F as all three of the men back away and haul ass. The mummi and mummy pieces follow them into the passageway. Then Beni creeps into the chamber. He stares in wonder at all the treasure. Then falls backwards into a pile of jew and rolls about.
Evelyn wakes up, lying chained to the top of the altar. S blinks, then turns her head, -- and looks right into the  ROTTED FACE of Anck-su-namun's corpse. Evelyn SCREAMS.
The elephant gun FIRES, blasting FLAME and SMOKE right in the LENS. O'Connell, Jonathan and Ardeth Ray race down a  passageway, a dozen mummies striding after them.
This whole place is comin, alive!

The men race around a corner. More mummies. They race aro another corner. More mummies. Onward they come. Methodica Relentless. Boxing in our heroes. O'Connell and Ardeth Ra FIRING as they go. Ardeth Ray goes empty.
I'm out.
He throws the machine-gun down and they all race into --
-- A small chamber. The lower half of the giant statue of HORUS stands in the middle of the chamber.
There he is!
They run up to the base of the statue,
Hello Horus old boy.
O'Connell looks back at the mummies coming down the  passageway. He reaches into his gunny-sack and pulls out stick of dynamite. Ardeth Ray taps him on the shoulder.
Allow me.

O'Connell hands him the dynamite and a match, then turns look at the statue. Ardeth Ray reaches forward and strike the match off O'Connell's stubbly face. O'Connell YELPS. Ardeth Ray lights the dynamite and throws it down the  passageway. They all hit the deck. The dynamite EXPLODES. Ripping apart the creatures, causing a CAVE-IN and sealin the passageway with rock and dirt. Now there's only one w out, -- another dark, creepy passageway.

Chained tight to the top of the altar, Evelyn hopelessly  struggles to free herself. She stops as Priest mummies st surrounding the altar. Evelyn is horrified as the hideous mummies kneel down and begin to CHANT, -- which now sound even more horrific due to the lack of tongues, jaws and m in the room. Imhotep steps up carrying the black Book Of The Dead. His hand reaches out and lovingly caresses Anck-su-namun's de cheek.

O'Connell and Jonathan are digging away at the seams of t secret compartment, it starts to give. And that's when Ar Ray spots another group of rotting mummies coming down th dark passageway, heading right for them. O'Connell looks
These guys just don't quit.
Ardeth Ray grabs the elephant gun and a handful of shells and runs off towards the mummies.
Keep digging!

O'Connell and Jonathan redouble their efforts, pulling ha on the seam. The compartment starts to loosen. About to g The last time this happened, salt acid sprayed out, remem Our heroes keep tugging. The tension mounts... And that's when a SKELETAL HAND BURSTS UP OUT OF THE GROU and grabs O'Connell's ankle. Several more moldy hands BUR up out of the ground. O'Connell and Jonathan struggle wit the mummies as they crawl up out of the dirt floor. One of the mummies violently shoves O'Connell away. Anoth grabs Jonathan by the throat and starts to strangle him. third mummy grabs at the secret compartment and pulls har

head_text.subj: AN INTENSE BURST OF ACID SPRAYS OUT OF THE SEAM AND HITS

text: THREE OF THE MUMMIES. The one strangling Jonathan gets it the back and drops him. All three mummies melt horribly.
Imhotep begins to read from The Book Of The Dead. A large SWIRLING HOLE starts to open in the detritus bog. Evelyn's eyes widen in amazement and horror.

Ardeth Ray BLASTS AWAY at the oncoming mummies. over at t base of the statue, O'Connell and Jonathan pull an ornate chest out of the secret compartment. O'Connell rips off t lid, reaches inside and pulls out a heavy burlap bag. He and Jonathan exchange nervous, excited looks. Then he  reaches into the bag and slowly pulls out the SOLID GOLD  Book Of The Living -- GOLDEN LIGHT reflects off their fac as they stare at it in wonder. The elephant gun goes empty. Ardeth Ray takes it by the b and wades into the remaining mummies swinging.
Save the girl! Kill the creature!
The mummies quickly overwhelm and start to tear him apart O'Connell lights the last stick of dynamite and throws it against the far wall. He and Jonathan hit the deck.
That's the last one, we better get  lucky.
The wall BLOWS. Debris COLLAPSES, -- but now here's a hol for them to get out. O'Connell and Jonathan race out thro the hole just as the remaining mummies enter the chamber.

Outside, Beni staggers across the sand with a saddlebag f with treasure. He throws it over the rear of a camel. Starts to climb up. Hesitates. Looks back at the temple d Licks his lips. And then his greed gets the better of him and he quickly climbs down and scurries back towards the  door.

Imhotep READS from the Book. The rotten Priest-mummies ro back and forth, CHANTING. Evelyn struggles. Then suddenly, the strange MIST wafts up out of the swirl hole and over to the sacred jars, it passes through them into Evelyn. Evelyn JERKS as though she's been electrifie The MIST passes through her and into Anck-su-namun's body The CHANTING PRIESTS, SWIRLING HOLE, WAFTING MIST and  IMHOTEP'S READINGS reach a crescendo. Anck-su-namun's cru EYELIDS suddenly POP OPEN. Evelyn stares at her in disbel Anck-su-namun's rotted head turns and looks at Evelyn wit empty sockets. Evelyn freaks out and struggles wildly, th she notices Imhotep holding the ancient sacrificial knife
With your death, my love and I will  be invincible!

He raises it up over Evelyn's chest, about to plunge it d Evelyn's eyes widen in horror. And that's when O'Connell Jonathan BURST IN. Imhotep spins around and faces them. Jonathan beams as he holds up the golden Book Of The Livi
I found it, Evy! I found it
Shut-up and get me off of here!

O'Connell grabs an ancient sword out of a statue's hand,  jumps up onto a gravestone and leaps out over the Priests The Priest-mummies stop chanting. The MIST vanishes. Imhotep steps forward. O'Connell STRIKES the sacrificial  knife out of his hand. Imhotep BELLOWS a command. The Pri stand up, swords and knives in hand, they ATTACK O'Connel

head_text.subj: EVERYTHING HAPPENS AT ONCE, READ FASTER

text: Open the book, Jonathan! Open the  book! That's the only way to kill  him!

O'Connell RACKS and CHOPS at the attacking Priest-mummies fighting his way to Evelyn. The skeletal creatures wildly SWING their swords, trying to STAB O'Connell. Jonathan fu with the book, struggling to open it, -- he can't.
I can't open it! It's locked or  something!

O'Connell CUTS two of the mummies in half, then swings hi sword down at Evelyn, -- CLANG! One chain breaks free. Jonathan spots a series of SOLID GOLD, FOUR-SIDED LOCKS a the binder. It hits him like lightning --
We need the key!
Imhotep grins, then grabs the KEY/BOX hanging from a chai around his neck, rips it off and shoves it into his pocke He picks up the sacrificial sword and heads for Jonathan.
What do I do, Evy!? What do I do!?
Read the inscription on the cover!

O'Connell swings his sword down again, -- CLANG! Evelyn n has one hand and one leg free. More mummies attack O'Conn force him back. Jonathan quickly starts translating the cover inscription but his ancient Egyptian is clearly awful.
Keetash-something, naraba-something.
Jonathan starts to backpedal through the cemetery, clutch the golden book; wide-eyed, as Imhotep moves in on him.
Ebarra im hatu Kashka ummmmm -- ?
Jonathan trips and falls on his ass. Imhotep CHARGES FORW O'Connell SLASHES another chain. Only one more left holdi Evelyn. Jonathan sits up and quickly looks back at the co
Rasheem Aaaaa ANUBIS!

Imhotep raises the sacrificial sword, about to kill Jonat And that's when the giant statue of Anubis suddenly CRASH through the wall -- shades of Ray Harryhausen. Only bette The god of Deaths, horrible, decrepit STONE FACE stares  angrily down. Jonathan stares back.
Oh boy.
O'Connell DECAPITATES a mummy and looks up at Anubis.
This just keeps gettin, better and  better.

Imhotep leaves Jonathan and heads for the giant statue. O'Connell leaps over and with one last swing of the sword frees Evelyn from her chains. More Priest-mummies attack, forcing him away. Evelyn jumps off the altar and starts t head for O'Connell, -- a SKELETAL HAND grabs her! Spins h around. It's Anck-su-namun's rotted corpse. Evelyn reacts Imhotep looks up at Anubis, points to O'Connell, and in  ANCIENT EGYPTIAN commands him to attack. Anubis moves for O'Connell, STOMPING over mausoleums and through the detri moat on his way. O'Connell quickly backs away.
Do something, Jonathan! Kill it!
You have got to be joking?
Evelyn is backing away from Anck-su-namun.
Finish the inscription, idiot!
Oh.
Anck-su-namun ATTACKS Evelyn. Evelyn fends her off as bes she can. Jonathan quickly looks back at the hieroglyphs o the book cover, fumbling badly under the pressure --
Ummm, Hootash im... Hootash im now  what is this last symbol here?
What's it look like!?

Anck-su-namun grabs Evelyn by the throat. The statue of A corners O'Connell, reaches down and GRABS him with it's  MASSIVE TALONS. O'Connell HACKS away at it. Jonathan star at the inscription, slightly oblivious.
It's an Anck symbol, with two little  squiggly lines above it, and a bird,  a stork! on either side.
Evelyn is being STRANGLED by Anck-su-namun.
Ah! Ah! Ahmenophus!
Yes,... I see.
The talons lift O'Connell up and start to CRUSH him.
Hootash im Ahmenophus!

The giant statue of Anubis instantly freezes in it's trac and PETRIFIES. It's off balance. Starts to fall. O'Connel slides free of it's talons. Evelyn SHOVES Anck-su-namun a Anck-su-namun looks up and opens her fetid mouth to screa just as Anubis CRASHES DOWN on top of her, SMASHING HER t powder and DRIVING her into the ground. Imhotep SHRIEKS in rage and horror, then turns and angril heads for Jonathan. Jonathan, sitting on his ass, quickly backpedals on his hands and heels. O'Connell leaps to his feet, sword in hand and runs for  Imhotep. Imhotep grabs Jonathan, lifts him up, rips the g Book Of The Living out of his hand and pins him to a wall O'Connell runs up and swings his sword at Imhotep, -- WAP SLICES Imhotep's right arm off. It drops to the ground, s clutching The Book Of The Living. Imhotep drops Jonathan spins around, facing O'Connell. O'Connell grins.
Okay pal, let's see how tough you  are without your right arm.
Imhotep grabs O'Connell with his left arm and THROWS him  half way across the cemetery. O'Connell SLAMS into a  gravestone, bounces off and crashes to the ground. He sha it off.
Alright,... so he's left handed.
Imhotep is already striding towards him. Jonathan lifts u his hand, -- HE HAS THE KEY/BOX BACK! He smiles at Evelyn
I got it!

Evelyn runs for Jonathan. O'Connell SWINGS his sword and CLEAVES a big chunk of mol flesh rot out of Imhotep's stomach. On the outside, Imhot looks human, but on the inside he is still a rotten old m Imhotep BACKHANDS O'Connell. Knocks him twenty feet back. O'Connell staggers to his feet. Imhotep is right there. C him hard with his left arm. O'Connell spins through the a SLAMS into the side of a mausoleum. Imhotep approaches, r in his eyes. O'Connell gets up, quickly pivots and HACKS  into Imhotep's head. Imhotep grins and PUNCHES O'Connell the face. O'Connell is thrown back, pulling his sword wit him. He bounces hard off the mausoleum. Lands on his feet. Totally beat-to-shit. Knees buckling. He can barely stand Jonathan lifts up the heavy gold book, -- Imhotep's sever hand still clings to it. Jonathan cringes in disgust. Eve yanks it off, throws it away, then start furiously workin the key into the series of locks, unlocking each of them. Imhotep strides forward. O'Connell backs into the mausole swings the sword, Imhotep tries to catch it, -- it CLEAVE through his palm and deeply imbeds itself into his forear No matter, Imhotep rips the sword away from O'Connell and casually flings it away. The golden Book Of The Living opens with a HISS. Jonathan holds it tight as Evelyn quickly turns the heavy gold pag looking for something. O'Connell turns to run, but Imhotep grabs him by the thro and lifts him off his feet. O'Connell hangs there, a daze mess. Imhotep grins, says something in ANCIENT EGYPTIAN,  then starts to strangle O'Connell. O'Connell chokes. Abou to die. Evelyn turns and faces Imhotep and reads an inscription:
Kadeesh mal! Kadeesh mal! Pared oos!  PARED OOS!!

Imhotep pivots and looks at Evelyn, a look of sheer terro on his face. Then he looks over at the detritus bog. Whic starts to BUBBLE and SHIFT. The SWIRLING HOLE begins to o And then suddenly THE SPIRITS OF THE EGYPTIAN GODS waft o of the black bog and SWIRL around the Priest-mummies. The mummies all collapse and turn to dust. And then the spiri attack Imhotep. Lifting him and O'Connell up into the air Imhotep lets go of O'Connell, who falls to the ground.
